title: MD
biography: Hagop Kantarjian is a hematologist and oncologist specializing in leukemia. He is a Professor and Chair of the Department of Leukemia at The University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center, where he holds the Samsung Distinguished Leukemia Chair in Cancer Medicine.
aiSummary: Hagop M. Kantarjian is a leukemia research specialist with an H-index of 320 at MD Anderson Cancer Center (Faculty). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet Oncology, Nature Medicine. Based in United States.
